message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item, and I believe it's a fair price considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1300000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $1250000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to get a good deal.
